name: Rorrim Lacigam
description:
Oh hello there traveler! 

Many creatures live in this forest. They are all good-natured and they would gladly meet you. However unfortunately they all looked into Rorrim Lacigam An ancient artifact that has caused plenty of doom and despair on those who gaze into its reflecting surface! Anyone who looks into Rorrim Lacigam will have their identity split up into 2. Only by having them bump into each other can they become one again. Can you find them all and help them merge back into one by guiding them towards each other?


Keyboard controls
ARROW Keys to move
Spacebar to shout scares the creatures, making them flee towards their other split-up part.

Gamepad:
Left stick to move
The A button to shout scares the creatures, making them flee towards their other split-up part.
